item.val:
Please key in this phone number for car NAVI system 098 869 6329 or this MAP CODE - 33246627*42
Note * For own transport please be at our SEASIR NAHA before 08:15 for morning trip or before 13:00 for noon trip. We do provide FREE car parking space.

Dear guest, A deposit request of JPY2,000 per person will send to your email from SEASIR PayPal account, please make the deposit to confirm your booking. A booking confirmation will send to you via email within 24 hours once deposit payment received.
